name: ServiceLoaderTest
description: Tests for verifying the loading and finding of ColumnHandler and PropertyHandler using ServiceLoader.

test_cases.name: testFindMoreThanLocalColumns
test_cases.description: Verifies that more than one ColumnHandler is found, indicating that core handlers were loaded.

test_cases.name: testFindMoreThanLocalProperties
test_cases.description: Verifies that more than one PropertyHandler is found, indicating that core handlers were loaded.

test_cases.name: testFindsLocalColumnHandler
test_cases.description: Verifies that the local TestColumnHandler is found among the loaded ColumnHandlers.

test_cases.name: testFindsLocalPropertyHandler
test_cases.description: Verifies that the local TestPropertyHandler is found among the loaded PropertyHandlers.
